product_name: The North Face Kilowatt Quarter-Zip Top - Men's
long_description: A technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Kilowatt Quarter Zip Top for men uses FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric to accelerate dry time and abrasion-resistant overlays to increase durability. Specialized FlashDry-XD fabric wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly; plus, it includes abrasion-resistant overlays to increase durability in key areas. Ventilation panels under the arms, along the sides of the torso and down the back increase breathability. Reinforced seaming reduces abrasion; thumbholes allow cuffs to extend over top of hands for warmth. The North Face Kilowatt Quarter Zip Top for men is engineered for a comforable range of motion while you run. Part of The North Face Mountain Athletic line of technical clothing and footwear built to withstand the rigors of sport-specific training by outdoor athletes.
short_description: A technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Kilowatt Quarter Zip Top for men uses FlashDry-XD(TM) fabric to accelerate dry time and abrasion-resistant overlays to increase durability.
